name: Maze Monsters Demo
description:
HEWWO! 
Thank you so much for coming to check out the first game I've made with Unity! 
I decided that instead of creating art for other peoples' games, I should try to make my own game! And boy, has it been a journey. 
Here is all you need to know to play the game!:
You are trying to find the ancient chest of gold from an old legend, but to do so, you must pass through multiple mazes first (this being the demo version, you won't get there just yet).
 
Controls:
Arrow Keys to move
Space Bar to shoot
wasd Keys work but not well! You have been warned!!!
The "Quit" button at the end doesn't really work either, to end/leave the game, you have to hit the "Escape" key. This is because I directly converted a Windows build to WebGL so the Quit Application function doesn't exactly...work anymore. Also WebGL's fullscreen function doesn't exactly look so great so I'd recommend not fullscreening the game. 



Notes!
If you're here because of a project, then welcome to my chaotic mess of a game! I really do hope you enjoy it, and please report all of the bugs! This helps me improve as a developer and learn more about the game engine. Thanks!



If you're here because you are a friend of mine and wanted to see what I've been up to...this is the project I was talking about. I hope you like this more than I do, which, at this point, is not at all. But thanks so much for your continued love and support I can't wait to do some projects with y'all now that I kinda know what I'm doing! 
Thanks, 
~Winter Moon
